title: Detailing DFS Strategies and Week 1 Plays with Mike McClure (Football 8/29)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the latest news from around the NFL and is then joined by SportsLine expert Mike McClure (16:00) who shares advice on how to approach daily fantasy football and issues Week 1 tips. 
Go to SportsLine.com/join and use the promo code TROPHY to get your first month for $1. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
